email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to offer mv STARLIGHT for your 8500MT steel coils shipment from Busan to Long Beach.
Rate: USD 78/MT CFR basis.
Laycan: 20-25 November 2023.
NYPE terms with demurrage USD 12,000/day.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you revise to USD 70/MT?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your feedback. After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of USD 74/MT. This is our best and final offer.

Please let us know your decision at the earliest.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 74/MT is still higher than our target. Can you adjust the laycan to 22-27 November and reduce the rate to USD 72/MT?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

We can adjust the laycan to 22-27 November and agree to a rate of USD 72/MT. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Agreed at USD 72/MT with the revised laycan. Please send the recap.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thank you for the confirmation. Please find the recap attached.

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 8500 MT
Load Port: Busan
Discharge Port: Long Beach
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: STARLIGHT
Freight: USD 72/MT
Laycan: 22-27 November 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
